 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_COVSOL_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_COVSOL_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vsip/core/metaprogramming.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/core/solver/qr.hpp>
 20
 21
 22
 23/***********************************************************************
 24  Declarations
 25***********************************************************************/
 26
 27namespace vsip
 28{
 29
 30/// Solver covariance system  A' A x = b, return x by reference.
 31///
 32/// Requires
 33///   A to be an M x N full-rank matrix
 34///   B to be an N x P matrix.
 35///   X to be an N x P matrix.
 36
 37template <typename T,
 38	  typename Block0,
 39	  typename Block1,
 40	  typename Block2>
 41Matrix<T, Block2>
 42covsol(
 43  Matrix<T, Block0>       a,
 44  const_Matrix<T, Block1> b,
 45  Matrix<T, Block2>       x)
 46VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
 47{
 48  length_type m = a.size(0);
 49  length_type n = a.size(1);
 50  length_type p = b.size(1);
 51  
 52  mat_op_type const tr = impl::Is_complex<T>::value ? mat_herm : mat_trans;
 53  
 54  // b should be (n, p)
 55  assert(b.size(0) == n);
 56  assert(b.size(1) == p);
 57    
 58  // x should be (n, p)
 59  assert(x.size(0) == n);
 60  assert(x.size(1) == p);
 61    
 62  qrd<T, by_reference> qr(m, n, qrd_nosaveq);
 63    
 64  if (!qr.decompose(a))
 65    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("covsol - qr.decompose failed"));
 66    
 67  Matrix<T> b_1(n, p);
 68    
 69  // 1: solve R' b_1 = b
 70  if (!qr.template rsol<tr>(b, T(1), b_1))
 71    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("covsol - qr.rsol (1) failed"));
 72    
 73  // 2: solve R x = b_1 
 74  if (!qr.template rsol<mat_ntrans>(b_1, T(1), x))
 75    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("covsol - qr.rsol (2) failed"));
 76    
 77  return x;
 78}
 79
 80
 81
 82/// Solver covariance system  A' A x = b, return x by value.
 83///
 84/// Requires
 85///   A to be an M x N full-rank matrix
 86///   B to be an N x P matrix.
 87///   X to be an N x P matrix.
 88
 89template <typename T,
 90	  typename Block0,
 91	  typename Block1>
 92Matrix<T>
 93covsol(
 94  Matrix<T, Block0>       a,
 95  const_Matrix<T, Block1> b)
 96{
 97  Matrix<T> x(b.size(0), b.size(1));
 98  covsol(a, b, x);
 99  return x;
100}
101
102} // namespace vsip
103
104#endif // VSIP_CORE_SOLVER_COVSOL_HPP
